testcase.name: Simple alert
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the website.............................................passed And I verify I am in the right page.........................................passed And I am in the right part of the page......................................passed When I click the button.....................................................passed Then an alert box should appear with the message "I am an alert box!".......passed

testcase.name: Login into the account
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to "http://thedemosite.co.uk/".............................passed And I go to the add a user page.............................................passed And I register with someone and password123.................................passed And I am able to see a successful registration..............................passed When I go to the login page.................................................passed And I enter the username someone............................................passed And I enter the password password123........................................passed When I click on the login button............................................passed Then It should be displayed "**Successful Login**"..........................passed

testcase.name: Search for doge
testcase.system-out: When I go to www.bing.com...................................................passed And I am on Bing hompage....................................................passed When I search the keyword doge..............................................passed Then the title of the page should contain doge..............................passed

testcase.name: Successful item selected
